title: [ Minecraft.net│INSIDER ] How to get into Minecraft Betas 如何参与Beta测试
author: 像素君
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-1 01:27 编辑 





HOW TO GET INTO MINECRAFT BETAS如何参与Minecraft的Beta测试
Wanna help us test Minecraft? It's easy! But beware of bugs!想帮助我们测试Minecraft吗？这很容易！不过需要当心bug哦！
Periodically, we release early versions of Minecraft updates to test out new features, shake out the wrinkles and squish the bugs before they reach a wider audience. It’s also a cool way to check out what new stuff is coming down the pipe.

每隔一段时间，我们就会发布Minecraft更新的早期测试版来测试我们的新特性，删繁就简，并在新版本的受众更广泛之前修复bug。这也是一条确定我们今后目标的不错道路。

Fancy helping us out? Then follow the instructions below - but be aware: betas are by their nature a bit unstable, and things are likely to be weird, wonky or just plain wrong. The game may crash and things you build might get corrupted. It’s a small risk, but a risk nonetheless!

你想帮助我们吗？那就按照下面的指示去做吧。但是要小心：Beta版非常不稳定，很多东西可能会是奇怪的，不可靠的，甚至是完全错误的。

Undeterred? Here's what you need to do.

没被吓住？那好，这是你接下来需要做的：

Java EditionJava版
In the Java Edition, we put out regular test versions known as Snapshots: just go to the Launch Options tab, enable Snapshots, and then select the latest snapshot by clicking the arrow next to the Play button on the main tab.

在Java版中，我们将普通的测试版称为快照。只需单击“启动选项”，启用快照，然后点击首页上Play按钮旁边的箭头就可以选择最新的快照来下载和游玩。

We also run beta tests for Minecraft on console, mobile and Windows 10.

我们会也在主机板，移动版和win10版发布测试版。

Xbox One / Windows 10Xbox One / Windows 10版
You will need to own the digital version of the game. For the beta, disc owners are not supported - sorry!
你需要拥有这个游戏的数字版来加入Beta测试，磁盘版是不被支持的——抱歉！

Joining the Minecraft Beta on Windows 10 or Xbox One:
加入win10版或Xbox One版的Minecraft测试：

1. Go to the Store app on Xbox One or a Windows 10 PC.
1.前往win10版电脑或Xbox One版上的商店。

2. Search for the Xbox Insider Hub app.
2.搜索软件：Xbox 会员中心。

3. Download and install Xbox Insider Hub.
3.下载并安装Xbox 会员中心。

4. Launch the Xbox Insider Hub.
4.运行Xbox 会员中心。

5. Navigate to Insider content > Minecraft Beta.
5.点击：内部内容>Miencraft Beta。

6. Select Join.
6.选择加入。

7. Have fun and find bugs!
7.尽情游玩并寻找bug吧！

Android安卓平台
Head over here for a breakdown of how to access betas on Android.
点击这里来阅读如何在安卓平台上参加Beta测试。

Please report all your bugs at bugs.mojang.com & please let us know what you think about the beta by pressing the feedback button in the game or visiting feedback.minecraft.net.

我们十分乐意你在bugs.mojang.com上汇报bug或是通过游戏中的反馈按键以及访问feedback.minecraft.net来告诉我们你对Beta测试的看法。

That's it! Have fun!

就说这么多了！祝你们玩得开心！
